in a way that relates to an autosome (= a chromosome other than one that determines the sex of an animal or plant): Many people afflicted with the condition can pass it on to their offspring as an autosomally dominant trait, though it can also occur spontaneously in individuals. Cystic fibrosis is an autosomally recessive inherited disease that does not present itself immediately in children.
More examplesFewer examplesThe disease is a rare, autosomally inherited condition that manifests in tumours that grow along the spine.
